alert.note: Alert for Breckinridge; Hancock; Meade (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 3:11PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Harrison, northwestern Clark, eastern Crawford, eastern Perry, Floyd, southeastern Washington, Meade, southeastern Hancock and central Breckinridge Counties through 345 PM EDT/245 PM CDT/... At 311 PM EDT/211 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles north of Carefree Town to 8 miles west of Hardinsburg. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Brandenburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM EDT/400 PM CDT/ for south central Indiana...and central Kentucky.
